header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Christmas, dinner, jokes, Christmas crackers, dreams, martial arts, cooking.
header.activity: talking whilst cooking a meal with housemates; having coffee with friends talking about relationships). Family chatting over Christmas dinner.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, requesting, telling jokes

speaker.dialect_rep: English - mix of south eastern and north west
